title: hey i made a ticket recovering account!
body: And when I go to my email to add more to it it says oops this doesn't exist yada yada, after it asks me to sign into an account so I log into this account and ticket isn't there? this first time I've had try recovering my account =/

replies.body: Make sure to use the [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) or an email address that you know you have access to, so we can reply back to you.  If you're using an email on the account that you don't have access to, then we won't really have a way to get back to you.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Hey thanks for the reply! but I think I messed up, I was told on reddit to submit a ticket recovering my account through that form but I used another Email not registered to any other league account so they can recover my account to the new email, is that why I don't see my ticket / or can add more to it because its not registered to a league account so  when i click the link in the email to direct me to my ticket it asks me to log in?

That's normal.  The ticket won't show up on the history so that it won't warn the person who took it that you're trying to get it back.  It can take up to two days to get a response depending on ticket volumes so sit tight until then.  Also: don't make a new ticket until you hear back, doing so will send you to the back of the line again; we don't want that do we :)
